definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

pinyin: Hua2 tie3 lu2 huo3 che1 zhan4

sentences.english: The preserved Sugar Railway Chi-Shan Station.
sentences.chinese: 被保存下來的糖鐵旗山車站。
我們乘出租汽車到車站去。

sentences.english: It's diagonally across the street from the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 它就在汽車站的斜對面。

sentences.english: Is here a bus stop near by?
sentences.chinese: 我想問問附近有沒有公車站？

sentences.english: We find the bus stop, which fortunately has a dumpling'n'soup lady present.
sentences.chinese: 我們找到了車站，很幸運的那裏有一個賣餃子的女士。

sentences.english: I had been waiting for 20minutes until car arrived.
sentences.chinese: 當車來的時候，我在車站已等了20分鐘。

sentences.english: Do you think MTR provide enough types of MTR shops?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲地鐵所提供的車站店鋪種類足夠嗎？

sentences.english: "Xi Nan Jiao"is a transfer station. You may transfer subway line 2.
sentences.chinese: “西南角”是換乘車站，您可以換乘地鐵2號線列車。

sentences.english: Apparel Commodity do business in the city railway station on this one.
sentences.chinese: 做服裝小商品的商貿城就在火車站這一塊。

sentences.english: When we got to the railway station, the train had left.
sentences.chinese: 我們到火車站時，火車已經開走了。

sentences.english: On arriving at the station, he found his wife waiting to meet him.
sentences.chinese: 他一到達車站，立即發現他的妻子在等着迎接他。

sentences.english: The school is three miles distant from the station.
He ran to the station only to find the train had left.
sentences.chinese: 他跑到火車站卻發現火車已開走。

sentences.english: A train whooshed by the station just now.
sentences.chinese: 剛有一列火車從車站飛速駛過。

sentences.english: There are always some beggars dressed in filthly clothes hanging around the subway stations.
sentences.chinese: 在地鐵車站總有一些穿戴邋遢衣服的要飯的人停留。

sentences.english: Roadside newspaper sellers all prefer bus stops.

definition: to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
to get on or into (a bus, train, car etc)
travel time/expected time for a car journey
bus/abbr. for 公共汽車|公共汽车[gong1 gong4 qi4 che1]/car belonging to an organization and used by its members (government car, police car, company car etc)/abbr. for 公務用車|公务用车[gong1 wu4 yong4 che1]
